# openMSE/MSEtool simulations {#sec-openmse-sims}



```{r preamble}
#| echo: false
#| message: false

# Load required R packages
library(Grym)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(flextable)
library(furrr)
library(progressr)
library(patchwork)
library(ggplot2)
library(tictoc)
library(MetBrewer)
library(ggdensity)

# Source PR functions (from https://github.com/ccamlr/Grym_Base_Case/tree/Simulations/3_Code/Source)
source("../part1_shared_files/code/prfit.R")

# ggplot default theme
theme_set(theme_bw())

# flextable default settings
set_flextable_defaults(
  digits = 4,
  font.size = 10, 
  font.family = "Calibri",
  theme_fun = "theme_zebra",
  table.layout = "autofit"
)
```
